sn52.7:4.2: Tatra kho āyasmā anuruddho bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn52.7:4.4: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato anuruddhassa paccassosuṃ.
sn52.7:5.1: “Cattārome, āvuso, satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā taṇhākkhayāya saṃvattanti.
sn52.7:5.3: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati … pe …
sn52.7:5.6: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ—
sn52.7:5.7: ime kho, āvuso, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā taṇhākkhayāya saṃvattantī”ti.
